channel.title: ::drags
channel.description: Hey, I would like to add an area that could hold enough drag.(s) to fight without going to in walls. I would also need help on how to add ::drags and code the drags (i pretty sure i can add drags) i just need help on how to make ::drags then it activates a tele. To a good open area. Mabey a cave? If you could give me a good area to put drags i would love it. And help me put command ::drags in! Thankyou--Nate :D woops srry it's a 317 delta server

item.title: ::drags
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Go into your client.java and find your customcommand method, look through it and you will most likely find commands that have teleporting already in them, copy and paste and add the coordinates you want to use.

As for the spawning, just go into your autospawn.cfg file and add the green dragons.

Read full topic

Do you want to add a command that will teleport you to an area full of dragons?
